name: Points for Stability
description:
Welcome to adulthood! With only 60 years/seconds on the clock, you've got to cram as much experience as possible into your remaining time on earth.

  • Each block card represents an action you can take in this life (sleep, exercise, work, eat, play). New actions are drawn every second.
  • Stack blocks on the black platform. Blocks will start out floaty but harden into place over time.
  • Blocks are worth different points—sleep and work are worth little, but give you structural stability, while play is worth the most and offers no stability.
  • If a block falls off the side, the points go away. To discard boring/unwanted cards, just drop them off the side.

Made for Ludum Dare 49!
